    • Method Detail

      • handleRawInput

        protected void handleRawInput(java.lang.String input)
        Passes received messages to the server so the server can forward the message to the right connection. If the input is null, the connection is gets closed.
        Overrides:
        handleRawInput in class TcpCon
        Parameters:
        input - string containing the contents of the MarkupMsg. The input argument can be null if the end of stream was reached.

      • sendMsg

        public boolean sendMsg(MarkupMsg msg)
        Sends the messages and flushes the stream.
        Specified by:
        sendMsg in interface ConnectionI
        Overrides:
        sendMsg in class StreamCon
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send across the connection
        Returns:
        true if the sending the message was successful, false otherwise. It does not guarantee that the message was received.
